trans-unit.source: Light object that projects its effect in a cone-shaped area along a specified direction.
trans-unit.target: 投射其效果沿指定方向方面锥形的光对象。

trans-unit.source: SpotLight is a kind of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight>, since it has a position, range, and attenuation.
trans-unit.target: SpotLight 是一种类型的<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight>，因为它具有位置、 范围和衰减。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.PointLight>

trans-unit.source: However, SpotLight also allows you to control the direction, shape, and other properties of the cone of the light's effect.
trans-unit.target: 但是，SpotLight 还可以控制方向、 形状和显示光效果圆锥体其他属性。

trans-unit.source: Specify values for <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A> (beyond which nothing is illuminated), and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A> (within which everything is fully illuminated) to change the spotlighting effect.
trans-unit.target: 为指定值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A>（超出其执行任何操作亮起），和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A>（在其中的所有内容已完全亮起） 若要更改点聚光照射效果。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A>

trans-unit.source: Lighting between the outside of the inner cone and the outer cone falls off linearly.
trans-unit.target: 照明的内部锥体外部和外部锥体之间以线性方式将。

trans-unit.source: ![Spotlight diagram](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight diagram")
trans-unit.target: ![聚光灯示意图](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "聚光灯示意图")

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref> class using the specified color, position, direction, and cone angles.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>类使用指定的颜色、 位置、 方向和锥体角度。

trans-unit.source: Diffuse color of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新漫射色<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Position of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新位置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Direction of the new <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 新的方向<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Angle that defines a cone outside which the light does not illuminate objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 定义锥形区域外的场景中的对象不会被光线照亮的角度。

trans-unit.source: Angle that defines a cone within which the light fully illuminates objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 定义的锥形的角度其中光源完全照亮场景中的对象。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"> </xref>，从而深度复制此对象的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 在复制依赖项属性时，此方法会复制资源引用和数据绑定 （但可能不再解析），但不是动画或其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 创建的可修改复本<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>对象，从而深度复制此对象的当前值。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不复制资源引用、 数据绑定和动画，而其当前值。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 此方法用于生成的可修改副本冻结<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>对象)。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 为方便起见，此方法将隐藏继承的强类型实现的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 有关详细信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>。</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 当前对象的可修改复本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property will be <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property was <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 克隆的对象<> *1> 属性将为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>即使源的<> *1> 属性<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the direction in which the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref> projects its light.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"> </xref> ，在其中指定的方向<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>投射其光。

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref> that specifies the direction of the Spotlight's projection.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Vector3D"></xref>它指定 Spotlight 的投影的方向。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `0,0,-1`.
Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.Direction*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.Direction*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.Direction*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an angle that specifies the proportion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>'s cone-shaped projection in which the light fully illuminates objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定的比例的角度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>的锥形光源完全照亮场景中的对象的投影。

trans-unit.source: The intensity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>'s illumination diminishes from full illumination to none in that angle of the light's projection between the InnerConeAngle and the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 强度<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>的照明从完全照亮减小为 none 的光线投影角度之间 InnerConeAngle 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>

trans-unit.source: ![Spotlight diagram](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight diagram") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![聚光灯示意图](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "聚光灯示意图") # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The angle in degrees that specifies the proportion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>'s cone-shaped projection in which the light fully illuminates objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 指定的比例的以度表示的角度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>的锥形光源完全照亮场景中的对象的投影。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `180`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `180`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets an angle that specifies the proportion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>'s cone-shaped projection outside which the light does not illuminate objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置指定的比例的角度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>的锥形外的场景中的对象不会被光线照亮的投影。

trans-unit.source: The intensity of the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>'s illumination diminishes from full illumination to none in that angle of the light's projection between the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A> and the OuterConeAngle.
trans-unit.target: 强度<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>的照明从完全照亮减小为无之间的光源的投影角度<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A>和 OuterConeAngle。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.InnerConeAngle%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight>

trans-unit.source: The light provides no illumination outside the angle specified by this property.
trans-unit.target: 此属性指定的角度之外没有照明光线。

trans-unit.source: ![Spotlight diagram](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "Spotlight diagram") ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![聚光灯示意图](~/add/media/spotlight-1.png "聚光灯示意图") # # 依赖项属性信息 | | | |-|-| |标识符字段 || |元数据属性设置为`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: The angle in degrees that specifies the proportion of a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>'s cone-shaped projection outside which the light does not illuminate objects in the scene.
trans-unit.target: 指定的比例的以度表示的角度<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight"></xref>的锥形外的场景中的对象不会被光线照亮的投影。

trans-unit.source: The default value is `90`.
trans-unit.target: 默认值为 `90`。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle*>依赖项属性。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.SpotLight.OuterConeAngle*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
